sortBy.name: ./sortBy
sortBy.optionsProvider: function() { var contextPath = CQ.shared.HTTP.getContextPath() || ''; var items = CQ.Util.eval(CQ.HTTP.get(contextPath+'/libs/social/commons/sortorder.json')); var opts = []; var defaultValues = ['newest', 'added', 'latestActivityDate_dt']; for (var i=0; i < items.sortorder.length; i++) { var item = items.sortorder[i]; var splitItem = item.split(':'); if(defaultValues.indexOf(splitItem[1]) > -1){ opts.push({ text:CQ.I18n.get(splitItem[0]), value: splitItem[1], checked: true }); } else{ opts.push({ text:CQ.I18n.get(splitItem[0]), value: splitItem[1] }); } } return opts; }

sortField.name: ./sortField
sortField.optionsProvider: function() { var contextPath = CQ.shared.HTTP.getContextPath() || ''; var items = CQ.Util.eval(CQ.HTTP.get(contextPath+'/libs/social/commons/sortorder.json')); var opts = []; for (var i=0; i < items.sortorder.length; i++) { var item = items.sortorder[i]; var splitItem = item.split(':'); opts.push({ text:CQ.I18n.get(splitItem[0]), value: splitItem[1] }); } return opts; }

listeners.selectionchanged: function(selectWidget, value, isChecked) { var sortOrderfield = selectWidget.findParentByType('form').find('name', './sortFieldOrder')[0]; if (value === 'added') { sortOrderfield.setValue('asc'); } else { sortOrderfield.setValue('desc'); } }
